analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/41/0xcfb7edf27b9234202135dc79dde568284aafbde5.sol:
	Contract ZiberToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/41/0xcfb7edf27b9234202135dc79dde568284aafbde5.sol#196-197)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Reentrancy in ZiberCrowdsale.finalizeCrowdsale (/unique_chucks/41/0xcfb7edf27b9234202135dc79dde568284aafbde5.sol#424-444):
	External calls:
	- multiplier = 10 ** token.decimals() (/unique_chucks/41/0xcfb7edf27b9234202135dc79dde568284aafbde5.sol#427-430)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- tokenAmountOf (/unique_chucks/41/0xcfb7edf27b9234202135dc79dde568284aafbde5.sol#439-440)

ZiberToken.decimals should be constant (/unique_chucks/41/0xcfb7edf27b9234202135dc79dde568284aafbde5.sol#132)
ZiberToken.name should be constant (/unique_chucks/41/0xcfb7edf27b9234202135dc79dde568284aafbde5.sol#130-131)
ZiberToken.symbol should be constant (/unique_chucks/41/0xcfb7edf27b9234202135dc79dde568284aafbde5.sol#131-132)
